scripts.test:comparison: npm run test:traditional && npm run test:visual
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && echo "Build ready for deployment"
scripts.deploy:test: npm run test:headless && echo "Tests passed - ready for deployment"
scripts.demo:manual: echo 'Navigate to http://localhost:3000/manual-demo to start the manual testing challenge'
scripts.demo:full: npm run demo:manual && echo 'Complete the manual demo, then run: npm run demo:automated'
scripts.demo:applitools-bugs: node scripts/inject-bugs.js inject applitools-demo-bugs && node selenium-tests/applitools-demo-bugs.cjs
scripts.demo:setup-applitools: npm run demo:applitools-baseline && npm run demo:applitools-bugs
scripts.demo:setup-visual: echo 'üì∏ Setting up visual baseline...' && npm run test:baseline-capture && echo '\n‚ö†Ô∏è  IMPORTANT: Go to dashboard and click ACCEPT before running broken test!'
scripts.demo:ultimate: echo 'üéØ ULTIMATE VISUAL TESTING DEMO' && node scripts/generate-demo-report.cjs && echo '\nüåê Complete report: http://localhost:3000/ultimate-report/'
scripts.compare:selenium-playwright:
echo 'üîÑ SELENIUM vs PLAYWRIGHT COMPARISON' && echo '
1Ô∏è‚É£ Selenium Baseline:' && npm run test:baseline-capture && echo '
2Ô∏è‚É£ Playwright Baseline:' && npm run test:baseline-playwright && echo '
üìä Check both in dashboard to compare!'
scripts.demo:complete: echo 'üéØ COMPLETE VISUAL TESTING DEMO' && echo '1Ô∏è‚É£ Traditional Testing...' && npm run test:static-functional && echo '\n2Ô∏è‚É£ Visual AI Testing...' && npm run test:broken-compare
scripts.ai:demo: echo 'ü§ñ AI vs Applitools Comparison Demo' && echo '\n1Ô∏è‚É£ Traditional approach (Applitools):' && npm run test:broken-compare && echo '\n2Ô∏è‚É£ Open-source AI approach:' && npm run ai:visual-test
scripts.demo:browser-specific: echo 'üåê Browser-Specific Bug Demo' && echo 'Testing CSS Grid differences across browsers...' && npm run ai:visual-test
scripts.compare:ai-vs-applitools: echo '‚öîÔ∏è  ULTIMATE COMPARISON: AI Vision vs Applitools' && echo '\nüìä Check: http://localhost:3000/ai-visual-results/ai-visual-report.html' && npm run ai:demo
scripts.demo:revolution: echo 'üöÄ THE AI VISUAL TESTING REVOLUTION' && echo 'This demo proves that advanced visual testing is now accessible to everyone!' && npm run demo:ultimate-ai
scripts.comprehensive-ai-study: npm run ai-accuracy && npm run hercules-concept && npm run open-source-vision
scripts.compare-all-models: npm run ai:demo && npm run test-open-source
scripts.percy:baseline: npx percy exec --config .percy.yml -- cypress run --config-file cypress.percy.config.cjs --spec cypress/e2e/percy-visual-baseline.cy.js
scripts.percy:baseline-only: npx percy exec --config .percy.yml -- cypress run --config-file cypress.percy.config.cjs --spec cypress/e2e/percy-baseline-only.cy.js
scripts.percy:bugs: npx percy exec --config .percy.yml -- cypress run --config-file cypress.percy.config.cjs --spec cypress/e2e/percy-visual-bugs.cy.js
scripts.percy:establish-baseline: echo 'üèóÔ∏è  ESTABLISHING PERCY BASELINE' && echo 'Capturing clean baseline images...' && npm run percy:baseline-only && echo '‚úÖ Clean baseline established!'
scripts.percy:test-against-baseline: echo 'üîç TESTING AGAINST BASELINE' && echo 'Capturing images with bugs for comparison...' && npm run percy:bugs && echo '‚úÖ Bug detection complete!'
scripts.compare:percy-vs-ai: echo '‚öîÔ∏è  PERCY vs AI COMPARISON' && echo '1Ô∏è‚É£ Running Percy tests...' && npm run percy:test && echo '2Ô∏è‚É£ Running AI tests...' && npm run ai:visual-test && echo 'üìä Check comparison report!'
scripts.compare:ultimate-all: echo 'üèÜ ULTIMATE VISUAL TESTING COMPARISON' && echo 'Testing: Applitools vs Percy vs AI' && npm run compare:percy-vs-ai && npm run ai:demo
